entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
